Author: yikesbecca
Text: i could’ve written the first few lines myself!  and hey, your comment is not unhelpful at all. it feels nice to know i’m not alone, although i wish you didn’t have to go through that, too.  i really appreciate your kind words ♡ i wish it was easier to apply to ourselves the advice and encouragement we give to others...  if you ever need someone to talk to, i’m here! you also hang in there not in the neck rope way, my friend.

Author: ehloveeash
Text: This was my entire childhood growing up with my mother and grandmother. Even if you aren't overweight, there were always comments to help you be "mindful" of your size. Like it wasn't on your mind 24/7. I cant say anything to make the comments less hurtful, but it is just their own insecurities reflected on you. You are more than your weight and you cannot control their comments but you can have your own self perception and know who you are and what size you are. I know this is the most unhelpful comment you could get but hang in there.
